pages.title: CJY
pages.text: <!DOCTYPE html>可爱的佳雨小同学body,html{ width:100%; height:100%}div{ position:absolute; border-radius:50%}#txt{ position:relative; width:200px; height:200px; margin:0 auto; margin-top:20%; font-size:50px; font-family:“楷体”; color:#000; z-index:1000} ///// function Balloon(pic){ //盒子 this.div = document.createElement(“div”) //初始位置 this.left = randomRange(5,1920); this.top = randomRange(3,1080); //背景颜色 if(pic == null){ this.bg = randomColor(null); //半径 this.r = randomRange(20,80) //0~1 }else{ this.bg = pic; this.r = 100 } //this.bg = randomColor();//0~255 //速度 this.speedX = randomRange(-5,5); this.speedY = randomRange(-5,5); } //绘制气球 原型 Balloon.prototype.drawBallon = function(parent){ this.parent = parent; var style = this.div.style; this.div.style.width = this.r 2 + “px”; this.div.style.height = this.r 2 + “px”; style.left = this.left + “px”; style.top = this.top + “px” ; style.background = this.bg parent.appendChild(this.div); } //封装指定范围随机函数 function randomRange(min,max){ return Math.random() (max-min) + min; }//气球动Balloon.prototype.run = function(){ //获取父容器宽高 var maxLeft = this.parent.offsetWidth - this.r 2; var maxTop = this.parent.offsetHeight - this.r 2; var ts = this; //使用定时 setInterval(function(){ //获取左边移动距离 var left = ts.div.offsetLeft + ts.speedX; //获取上边移动距离 var top = ts.div.offsetTop + ts.speedY; //判断边界 if(left <=0 ){ left = 5; ts.speedX = -1; } if(top <=0 ){ top = 5; ts.speedY = -1; } if(left >= maxLeft){ left = maxLeft; ts.speedX = -1; //ts.speedY = -1; } if(top >= maxTop){ top = maxTop; ts.speedY = -1; //ts.speedX *= -1; } //开始移动 ts.div.style.left = left + “px”; ts.div.style.top = top + “px”; },20);}//封装随机颜色function randomColor(){ var r = randomRange(0,255); var g = randomRange(0,255); var b = randomRange(0,255); var a = randomRange(0,1); return “rgba(“+r+”,”+g+”,”+b+”,”+a+”)”;} ///// for(var i=0;i<50;i++){ //创建气球对象 var b = new Balloon(null); //绘制气球 b.drawBallon(document.body); //气球动 b.run(); } //照片 var n = 0; var t = setInterval(function(){ var b = new Balloon(“url(http://p92ab717x.bkt.clouddn.com/CJY"+n+".jpg)"); //绘制气球 b.drawBallon(document.body); //气球动 b.run(); n++; if(n>6){ clearInterval(t); } },1000)
